it isnt a hologram thing. Blacknightmare is in a simulation type 
thing where hjer body is actually in a capsule of sort. Whatever 
happens to her body in the simulation, happens to her in the pod.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> LN, if your holo is attacking Blacknightmare, then I suggest that 
> you re-post. Though it's not in the rules (Yan forgot to add it 
in), 
> holograms are images, and cannot do damage.
> 
> 
> On 19 Jul 2001, at 20:55, Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> 
> > The simulation Hellpeon smirked as it flew forward at 
Blacknightmare
> > and slashed at her with its Chaochitan energy sword a few times 
before
> > launching another large Chaochitan energy at Blacknightmare. For 
her
> > there was no other escape from here except death, thus was the 
penalty
> > for failing the test. Meanwhile Blight simply smirked at Darkfate 
and
> > then turned and headed towards one of the walls.
> > 
> > Blight: "They will work. Or you will die. As far as I can see its 
a
> > win-win situation for me."
> > 
> > With those words Blight walked through a new opening in the wall 
that
> > sealed itself right back up after he left. He was now once again 
in
> > the main control room of the complex, and soon a transmission was
> > opened to all of Darkfate's troops, their frequency was also
> > discovered when Blacknightmare was scanned. He chuckled somewhat
> > before his message played over the comm lines of every single 
member
> > of Darkfates men.
> > 
> > Blight: "This is Blight, of the Infecticons, your commander, 
Darkfate
> > is now our prisoner. If you do not do as we say, we shall kill 
him.
> > You are all to stop with whatever you are doing and are to come 
to the
> > location of this transmission. You will recieve further orders 
from me
> > then. If you need a landmark... just hover over the big 
whirlpool."
> > 
> > Blight laughed to himself as he then pressed another button. Back 
in
> > the part of the base Alecto was in, an anti gravity device 
activated
> > beneath her and sent her flying out of the chamber and back to 
ledger
> > and co. At that point the whirling water vortex greatly shrank 
leaving
> > only a small entry point down to the same sealed off section of 
the
> > base. And still at the bases' center a massive hole was now in the
> > ground but all within the hole was metal and electronics beneath 
that.
> > And still the nanites continued to build down deeper into the 
already
> > seemingly bottomless thing.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Blacknightmare/Darkfate::
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Blacknightmare felt chaotical energy  struk her but she would 
> > fight; 
> > > she had a lot things to live, she had to destroy Vamprah and  
the
> > > most important: She liked to see Orchestra again. Blacknightmare
> > > started to looking for a way to scape... Pain was increasing 
with
> > > every second.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Darkfate smirked and said "I will be a prisioner without worth,
> > > unless you try to force the troops that I bring here to work 
for 
> > you."
> >
